title: Four ways to drama (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: University of California. Dept. of Theatre Arts. Motion Picture Division, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Mass media - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Mass media - Study and teaching

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
description: Presents four versions of a short dramatic episode - stage, radio, television and motion pictures - using the same plot and character to illustrate and compare the requirements of each medium.
